krrood.entity_query_language.rxnode.GraphVisualizer = None#

weight: str = ''#

wrap_edgecolor: typing_extensions.Optional[str] = None#
wrap_alpha: float = 0.08#
enclosed: bool = False#
id: int#

property root: RWXNode#
visualize(figsize=(35, 30), node_size=7000, font_size=25, spacing_x: float = 4, spacing_y: float = 4, curve_scale: float = 0.5, layout: str = 'tidy', edge_style: str = 'orthogonal', label_max_chars_per_line: typing_extensions.Optional[int] = 13)#

Visualizes the graph using the specified layout and style options.

Provides a graphical visualization of the graph with customizable options for size, layout, spacing, and labeling. Requires the rustworkx_utils library for execution.

Parameters:

  • float) (figsize (tuple of) Size of the figure in inches (width, height). Default is (35, 30).

  • (int) (font_size) Size of the nodes in the visualization. Default is 7000.

  • (int) Size of the font used for node labels. Default is 25.

  • (float) (curve_scale) Horizontal spacing between nodes. Default is 4.

  • (float) Vertical spacing between nodes. Default is 4.

  • (float) Scaling factor for edge curvature. Default is 0.5.

  • (str) (edge_style) Graph layout style (e.g., tidy). Default is tidy.

  • (str) Style of the edges (e.g., orthogonal). Default is orthogonal.

  • (Optional[int]) (label_max_chars_per_line) Maximum characters per line for node labels. Default is 13.

Returns:

The rendered visualization object.

Raises:

ModuleNotFoundError If rustworkx_utils is not installed.
